kw.msg: POST Request : url=http://api.openweathermap.org/data/2.5/weather?q=S%C3%A3o+Paulo&appid=e2f1d841cc16cff49a0aa18b531d71e0x path_url=/data/2.5/weather?q=S%C3%A3o+Paulo&appid=e2f1d841cc16cff49a0aa18b531d71e0x headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.26.0', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate, br', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Content-Length': '0'} body=None

kw.name: Set Test Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current test.

kw.name: Then validate error message for invalid api key
Dictionary Should Contain Item
kw.doc: An item of ``key`` / ``value`` must be found in a ``dictionary``.
